resources.string: Harry Potter Trivia Quiz
question
Wrong Answer Young Wizard!
Correct Answer Master Wizard!
Where does Hagrid get baby Harry from Godric\'s Hollow to Privet Drive?
What color is Hagrid\'s bushy hair?
What does Hagrid bring for Harry\’s birthday the night he finds him in the hut on the rock with the Dursleys?
What does Hagrid cook in the fireplace inside the hut on the rock?
What is Hagrid\’s job at Hogwarts?
What colour is Hagrid\’s umbrella?
Why was Hagrid\’s wand snapped in half?
What birthday present does Hagrid buy Harry in Diagon Alley?
Why is it particularly worrying that Hagrid has a pet dragon?
What present does Hagrid give Harry at the end of Philosopher’s Stone?
Who gives Harry his first ever Hogwarts school list?
What kind of cauldron was on Harry\’s first year Hogwarts list?
On Harry\’s first list, what were first-years expressly not allowed to bring to Hogwarts?
How many sets of plain black work robes did first-year students require?
Who wrote the Hogwarts set text a Beginners\’ Guide to Transfiguration?
Which of the following was not part of the first-year uniform?
How did the Weasleys and Harry travel to Diagon Alley to pick up school supplies in Chamber of Secrets?
Which author wrote seven of the eight books on Harry\’s second-year school list?
In which of Harry\’s school years did dress robes appear as an item on his school list?
What was the name of the book Hagrid put on Harry and his classmates\’ school lists for Care of Magical Creatures classes?

What is 2+2?
A photograph of his parents
A newspaper
A birthday cake
